document_data.name: ''Pearly White Ioun Stone''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''pearly white ioun stone''''' was a type of ''[[ioun stone]]'' that offered gradual healing properties.
document_data.Description: It was said that this type of ioun stones were created using the soul of a dead [[troll]].
document_data.Powers: When a ''pearly white ioun stone'' was used by an individual it ''[[regenerate]]d'' their wounds over a lengthy period of time.
document_data.History: One of these ''ioun stones'' was hidden away within the abandoned [[Temple of Amaunator (Umar Hills)|temple]] of [[Amaunator]] in the [[Umar Hills]].
document_data.Notable Owners: The [[halfling]] fence [[Waizahb]] was in the possession of one during the time she traveled with the [[Coalition]] army.
